sub_title: Philosopher of biology, science and artificial intelligence
summary:
KEYWORDS
- Passionate
- Out of the box
- Broad interest

SKILLS
- Solving complex problems
- Coaching (MSc and PhD students, professionals)
- Giving inspirational lectures

RECENT WORK (ENGLISH)
- 2018: A trans-disciplinary realist ontology for the empirical basis in science: contributions of the Operator Theory
- 2017: Why on theoretical grounds it is likely that ‘life’ exists throughout the universe
- 2016: Evolution and transitions in complexity. The science of hierarchical organization in nature (Springer).

OTHER WORK
- 2012: The pursuit of complexity (KNNV)
- 2010: PhD: The Operator Hierarchy. A chain of closures connecting matter, life and artificial intelligence.
- 1993: PhD: Physical conditions affecting pyrethroid toxicity in arthropods

CONTACT
- gajm.jagers (ad) gmail.com
